item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:45:43 UTC – Details)


Loomla: Provide your pets with a high-quality daily life.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9 inches; 1.98 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ VC1402
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Shenzhen Jiangrui Investment Development
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08NKF9PLS

High Capacity – Staying hydrated can be a challenge for pets, especially during the summer months. The Loomla stainless steel cat water fountain is your answer to a long-lasting water supply for small pets in your home. The dog and cat water fountain holds 85 ounces, it’s enough water for a small animal for almost a week! The water level window shows you how much is left in the cat and dog water bowl dispenser, so your pet can stay hydrated and not get thirsty.
Whisper-quiet – This water fountain for cats inside has a water pump that is so quiet, you’d never know it’s there! The low noise water dispenser for cats and dogs is a great way to help your pets stay calm and hydrated at night. Many animals are frightened by loud noises, so the quiet design of this dog and cat fountain water bowl makes it more enticing for animal owners who want their pets healthy and content.
Entertainment For Your Pet – Our cat and dog water fountain was designed with your pets in mind and provides an easy way for them to quench their thirst while having fun at the same time! A pet water fountain can be just the cool thing you need in order to keep your little buddy hydrated and entertained. Pet supplies water fountains are an amusing way of making water enjoyable for animals.
Always Clean & Fresh Water – Don’t let your pets go thirsty! Our pet fountain is a great way to keep your furry friends hydrated. The dog and cat water dispenser ensures that no matter how busy you might be, they’ll always have clean and fresh water to drink. The cat and dog water dispenser filter uses multiple purification systems, it purifies the water using carbon non-woven fabric and ion exchange resin. 2 exchange filters are included with the dog and cat supplies water fountain.

Why should you choose the Loomla Water Fountains?

  • Fun for your pet – For your pets drinking from a drinking fountain is way more interesting and fun than just drinking out of their bowl.
  • Stylish Design – The pet drinking fountain has lovely and stylish bellflower design and comes in a variety of colors that make it an attractive home decor item.
  • 3 Water Flow Settings – Adjusting the automatic water dispenser settings to match your pet’s size and tastes is easy. Just choose one of our automatic drink dispenser modes: Flower waterfall / Waterfall and fountain / Fountain
  • Healthy choice – Clean water is one of the most important aspects of your pet’s health. Pet water fountain filter has an upgraded sophisticated filtration system that filters water better than ever before.
  • Easy Installation – Our automatic dog water dispenser is easy to set up, just affix the pump, install led next to the water level window, add filter and drinking dish on top, and you are good to go! We also provide a manual with our water fountain for dogs inside.

Read more

Structure of Loomla Fountain

Take Good Care of Your Pet

What should you pay attention to?

  1. The fountain’s LED lights have two modes that can be controlled on and off.
  2. The pump has two locating holes to assist installation.
  3. Please use it indoors on a flat surface.
  4. For your pet’s health and safety, clean the water pump at least once every two weeks.
  5. To provide clean enough water continuously, please replace the filter and the sponge every two or three weeks, and rinse the filter with water before use.
  6. Please be careful to prevent pets from chewing the wires and swallowing the parts.

What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain（8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9in）

1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）

1 x DC Pump (with a 70.9in cord）

2 x Filters

1 x Pre-filter Sponge

1 x Instruction Manual

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Steps for Small Dogs and Cats, Portable Ramp Stairs for Couch, Sofa, and High Bed Climbing, Non-Slip Balanced Indoor Step Support, Paw Safe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $89.99 - $75.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:35:49 UTC – Details)


Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the couch to give you a snuggle. But if your pet is too small or getting older they can’t always jump up and down to do it themselves. And if you’re not always around to help them or you’re getting a bit old yourself, sometimes you need a little extra help. We developed the Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs as a simple, effective way to get them up and down while putting less stress on you both. Featuring a non-slip bottom these fabric-covered stairs in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step sizes simply push right up to the edge so they can climb up or get down quickly, easily, and safely. Product Details: Pet Stairs for Couch, Bed, and Sofa; Supports Small to Medium Dogs and Cats; Heavy-Duty CertiPUR-US Certified Foam; Well-Balanced, Reliable Support for Pets; Lightweight and Portable for Whole Home Use; Soft Fabric Exterior for Paw-Friendly Support; Available in Multiple Colors to Match Home Decor; Help your small dog or aging cat get up on the couch or bed more easily with a soft, supportive foam pet stair system from Best Pet Supplies designed specifically for your four-legged friends. Get one now by clicking Add to Cart above.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 30 x 16 x 22.5 inches; 5.78 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ST235C-L
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08L42MKC3
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam: To ensure that your pet gets the safest quality steps, we made sure that our USA sourced foams are CertiPUR-US Certified. CertiPUR-US Certified foams are manufactured without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.
Reduces Strain on Older Adults – Our versatile dog steps not only help your pets they minimize the need for you to have to pick up your animal to get them up on the furniture, which is especially important if you struggle with strength or stability
Multiple Step Size Options – Ideal for small to medium sized pets these steps for dogs and cats come in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step options, so you can use them as dog stairs for beds or pet stairs for cats who need help climbing on a sofa
Trendy Home Decor Colors – We want our dog stairs for high beds and couches to better match your living room, bedroom, or personal space which is why they’re available in 17 different colors and patterns to fit your individual style

Read more

Stability For All Ages

With an anti-slip bottom and 15 or 16 inch width, your dog or cat will climb effortlessly to their favorite spots.

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam*

Crafted from CertiPUR-US certified foams, these pet stairs are made without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.

Certificate Issued: September 25, 2018 Alliance for Flexible Polyurethane Foam/CertiPUR-US program.

Cushion Every Step

The mattress-grade foam inside cushions and supports your pet’s every step reducing stress and relieving pressure on their paws and joints.

Easy to Keep Clean

All sizes of steps come with a completely removable cover that is machine washable. All our fabrics are pleasing to the touch and the eyes. With different options to choose from, it will be easy to maintain your household’s good vibes.

Read more

Sizes Available:

– Small: 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L.

– Medium: 15″W x 18″H x 24″L.

– Large: 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L.

Different Heights For Different Spaces

Does your dog need just a little help getting on the couch? Is your cat finding it difficult to reach his favorite window? Give them ultimate access with our 3 ranges of height.

The large is 22 1/2″ inches in height, giving your pet access to taller places within your home. The medium reaches 18″ in height, allowing for a simple climb to reach a snuggle session. The small steps are 13 1/2″ tall, for a simple boost up to a favorite window sill.

  • Our steps are easy to move around your home or take on the go for some adventures. Never worry about your pet’s accessibility anymore, with Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs!

Read more

Double filtration system: Equipped with activated carbon filter and pre-filter sponge, the automatic cat and dog water fountain can provide your pet with pure drinking water and keep healthy.
3.2 L/108 Oz Large Capacity: The capacity of water fountain is 3.2L, and the high and low water level lines are marked in the container, and the effective volume is more than 3L, very suitable for multi-pet families.
Ultra-quiet: The 1.5W pump is super silent when running, keep it below 20db, only the sound of water flow can be heard, even if it runs at night, it will not affect your sleep.
Encourage Drinking : This cat water fountain is equipped with a faucet and spring surge modes which match Habits of drinking water under the tap of cats, dogs. The dynamic water flow helps attract pets to drink,which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Customer Support: For any questions, support or complaint, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem 24H.

Dual Filtration pet water fountain

Filter hair, debris and large particles, remove odor and impurities.Protect the drinking water health of pets such as cats and dogs.

Easy to clean

TOMXCUTE which can be washed by hand or machine washed in the dishwasher. It is recommended to clean once a week.

stainless steel pet fountain

our pet fountain is made of imported total 304 stainless,High grade Stainless Steel Drinking Fountain is unbreakable, durable and easy to clean

Read more

Sleep-like quiet

The noise level is less than 20 decibels, creating a more quiet and comfortable environment for you and your pet, No power consumption too much.

Large capacity

No matter where you go, you don’t have to worry about pet drinking water. 3.2L large-capacity pet water dispenser.

5.What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain, 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）, 1 x Pre-filter Sponge, 1 x DC Pump, 3 x Filters, 1 x Instruction Manual

Read more

According to the various behaviors of pets, the faucet type pet water dispenser is more favored by cats and dogs

Q: How often should I clean the drinking fountain?

A: We recommend cleaning the water dispenser every two weeks.

Q: How can I get the filters for 2-4week replacements?

A: We also sell the replacement filters online. If you have any questions, please feel free to find us.( 3 carbon filters included in the package of the cat fountain )

Q: How can I judge the water level in the drinking fountain?

A: Due to technical difficulty, it is not easy to provide a visible window for the stainless steel water dispenser, but we have marked the “MIN” and “MAX” lines in the water tank.

Q: What should I pay attention to about the pump?

A: Firstly, the pump should be cleaned every 2 week; then if the water level in the tank is too low, the water pump still keeps running and prone to fail. Please add water to the water tank in time.

Q: How long is the power cable?

A: The length of the cable is 180 cm.

Q. Noise Level Up ？

Check if it`s empty or water level drop below minimum, then refill the fountain under max level. Check if there are hairs blocking the impeller of the water pump.Sometimes the impeller was totally encrusted in calcium. Please clean the pump weekly to extend the life , and more importantly, it is healthier for pets to drink water.Any questions and concerns, please send message to us on Amazon, and we will give you a satisfied solution within 16 hours.

[helping pets overcome fears] if your dog hates nail trimming or nail grinding, use this dog hammock for grooming. you can restrain him effortlessly, do his nail trimming, hair grooming, bathing and many more jobs easily with half the effort and twice the success!this dog grooming hammock can help dogs be at ease and calmly watch you work. you never need to fight with your pet for nail trimming again.
[simple and convenient to use] put the dog’s legs into the holes, clearly marked front and rear; then use the hooks to hang the hammock off the ground. if your dog feels nervous for the first time, try some snacks to soothe him. he will calm down quickly and have minimal difficulty.when your dog gets used to the hammock, she will even enjoy it.
[professional nail clippers and file]  our nail clippers are recommended by many professional pet groomers. this pair of nail clippers is professionally made with a safe guard blade, which can prevent you from the risk of over-cutting and causing damage to your pet’s nails. meanwhile, the kit is also equipped with a file, which can file the trimmed nails more round and smooth. most groomers and veterinary clinics like to use our tool set.
[suitable for various sizes dogs] the dog grooming sling hammock has four sizes for you to choose, large, medium，small and extra small. no matter what breed your dog is, you can find the corresponding size.  it’s suitable for any dog under 80 pounds. if you bought the wrong size or have any other issues, our 24 hour tailored service will work to make it right until you are satisfied.

【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

4.5
